name: Do Or Die (itch)
description:
Do or Die is fast paced educational puzzle game.

You play as a lab rat who is put through different puzzles.

Use your keyboard and mouse to play this game. 

You will need to think fast on your feet. Make sure to read your prompts correctly... as you might misread the question.

Thank you for playing! :)

 Maria Cerqueira (D11) - Art, Design, UI/UX, and UI implementation in Unity

 Ryan Coughlan (D11) - Code and Design

Due to time constraints we didn't have a lot of time to work on it, this is just a demo version with only one puzzle. We've attached images with other puzzle concepts.
